thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Daimay Automotive Interior's Share Trade To Halt, To Buy Factory Site

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Daimay Automotive Interior's Share Trade To Halt, To Buy Factory Site

organizations.name: shanghai daimay automotive interior co ltd

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Shanghai Daimay Automotive Interior Co Ltd:
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO HALT FROM FEB 1 PENDING ANNOUNCEMENT RELATED TO ASSETS RESTRUCTURING
* SAYS IT PLANS TO BUY FACTORY SITE FOR UP TO 200 MILLION YUAN ($31.83 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DROcgh ; bit.ly/2FwasIV Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2835 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
